followlistanontext: Please log in to view or edit items on your watchlist.
followlistedit-normal-explain:
Users on your watchlist are shown below.
To remove a user, check the box next to it, and click "{{int:Followlistedit-normal-submit}}".
You can also [[Special:EditFollowlist/raw|edit the raw list]].
followlistedit-raw-explain:
Users on your users watchlist are shown below, and can be edited by adding to and removing from the list;
one title per line.
When finished, click "{{int:Followlistedit-raw-submit}}".
You can also [[Special:EditFollowlist|use the standard editor]].
followlistedit-raw-done: Your users watchlist has been updated.
followlistedit-raw-failed: {{PLURAL:$1|1 user can't|$1 users can't}} be added:
followlistedit-clear-explain: All of the users will be removed from your followed users list
followlistedit-clear-submit: Clear the users watchlist (This is permanent!)
followlistedit-clear-done: Your users watchlist has been cleared.
followlistedit-too-many: There are too many pages to display here.
tog-followlist-allow: Allow other users to add me to their users watchlist
